    • Constructor Detail

      • TextBox

        public TextBox(java.lang.String s,
       int x,
       int y,
       int width,
       int height,
       boolean editable,
       boolean multiline,
       java.awt.Graphics g,
       boolean password)
        Parameters:
        s - string
        x - x position of upper-left corner
        y - y position of upper-left corner
        width - width of box
        height - height of box
        editable - true if content can be typed in
        multiline - true if the box displays more than one line of text
        g - Graphics
        password - true if input is anonymized with '*'
